rukus.text: Ate alaha ne hukama kita ki do pujanayoga na bana'o. Uha ika hi pujanayoga hai. Isa la'i mere tom hi darom hove
Ate usa da hi hai jihara kujha akasam ate dharati vica hai. Ate hamesa use de hukama nu hi pravana karana hai. Tam tusim alaha nu chada ke kise hora tom darade ho
Ate jihari'am tuhade kola ni'amatam (bakhasisam) hana, uha alaha di'am hi hana ate alaha valom hi hana. Phira jadom tuhanu takalifa hudi hai. Tam usa pasa madada la'i benati karade ho
Phira jadom uha tuhade kasata dura kara dida hai. Tam tuhade vicom ika varaga apane raba da sarika bana'una lagada hai
Tam ki uha inakari ho jave, usa ciza tom jihari asim usa nu bakhasi hai. Isa la'i kujha dina labha lai lavo. Jaladi hi tusi jana lavauge

Ate iha loka sadi'am diti'am ho'i'am vasatu'am vicom unham da hisa la'unde hana, jinha de sabadha vica inham nu kujha gi'ana nahim. Alaha di kasama jihara jhutha dausa tusi laga rahe ho, usa di tuhade tom zarura pucha hovegi
Ate uha alaha de la'i beti'am thahira'unde hana. Uha isa tom pavitara hai. Ate apane la'i uha cahude hana jo dila vica a'unda hai, bhava bete
Ate unham vicom kise nu beti di khusakhabari diti jave tam usada cihara kala ho janda hai. Ate uha apane apa vica ghutana mahisusa karana lagada hai

Jisa ciza di unham nu khusakhabari diti jandi hai. Usadi be-izati tom uha lokam kolom chipada phirada hai. Usa nu be-izati nala rakho jam miti vica chipa devom. Kina bura phaisala hai, jihara iha karade hana
Suri misala hai unham lokam la'i jihare praloka de dina upara bharosa nahim rakhade. Ate alaha la'i utama misalam hana. Uha takatavala ate tataveta hai
